subject: AI & Agents
title: Filter Bubbles and Echo Chambers
description: One-minute skill: Filter Bubbles and Echo Chambers.

hook.text: You click one political video. Your feed becomes 100% politics within a week.

buildup.text: Filter bubbles form when recommenders only show content aligned with past behavior.

discovery.text: Users are exposed to narrower perspectives over timeâ€”missing diverse viewpoints and ideas.

twist.text: Users say they want diversity but click on familiar content. Revealed vs stated preferences clash.

climax.text: Inject controlled diversity: show 10-20% exploratory items outside the user's comfort zone.

punchline.text: Pop the bubble. Show what users need, not just what they click.

quiz.question: What causes filter bubbles?
options: Recommenders only showing content matching past behavior
Too few items in the catalog
